room_title: Escape room "The Plight of Corndog Crockett" by Maggie Valley Puzzle Rooms in Maggie Valley
review: This was such a fun experience for us in Maggie Valley! There were two of us who did Coondog Crocket's room and it was an absolute blast with such a cool story. Definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a fun way to spend an afternoon and have a great adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The Plight of Corndog Crockett" by Maggie Valley Puzzle Rooms in Maggie Valley
review: We had a great time and did both rooms today. Did the Corndog Crockett room with just my husband and myself and loved working together to find all the clues. We did Swindlers list with another couple we just met there and came out on top! The owners are very friendly and love to tell how they got started. Such a fun day!
